description: An HDM file is a markup language webpage file that is created in the Handheld Device Markup Language (HDML). It contains markup tags similar to HTML language, but is designed for handheld electronic devices such as smartphones and PDAs. The HDML file format specifications were submitted to W3C for standardization but couldnâ€™t become a standard. HDM is based on the HDML file format specifications available at W3 website.
